Do you have any questions\? Check our FAQ
Looking for something specific\?\nMake your request!
Enter information about what you want
Do you want the product with Box\?
Tell us where you are\nand where you\'re going.
Original Box may incur customs fees.
What if they don\'t deliver my order\?
If your order is not delivered, we will first contact the traveler, if there is no possibility of delivery, we will refund the amount you paid and cancel the delivery process.
What if they don\'t confirm receipt\?

If the buyer does not confirm receipt, we will contact them, however, before that, you will have to confirm delivery and have a photo of the delivered product. We will then be able to look at the situation and you will receive your payment.
How can I report a user\?

If you want to report a user, on the home page, there will be a text written Support, after clicking there, you will have the option to Report user, follow the steps that are requested and you will be able to report a user.
What if the traveler can no longer deliver my order\?
If the traveler is unable to deliver their product, they will contact us and we will then contact you to receive your refund.
What if customs prevents my product from arriving\?
